content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f829 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com hot cakes girl s poncho materials hot cakes 1 1 2 200g cakes shown in color 4 - denim mix gauge 18 sts =4 over st st on size 7 needles size to fit child size 2 4-6 8-10 years approx length at front 13 17 21 needles us size 7 4 5mm - 16 and 32 circular 1x1 ribbing in the round k1 p1 repeat around begin poncho with 16 needle very loosely cast on 76 82 88 sts place a marker and join into the round taking care not to twist work in 1x1 ribbing for 1 1 5 1 5 begin pattern round 1 knit placing a second marker after 38 41 44 sts round 2 * k1 m1 knit to 1 st before the next marker m1 k1 repeat from * around 4 sts increased round 3 knit repeat rounds 2 & 3--- 23 34 39 more times then round 2 once more 100 144 164 total sts increased 176 226 252 sts move to the longer length needle when needed begin bottom garter st section as follows round 1 knit round 2 * p1 m1 purl to 1 st before the next marker m1 p1 repeat from * around 4 sts increased round 3 knit round 4 purl repeat rounds 1-4 --- 3 3 4 more times 192 242 272 sts bind off knitwise weave in all ends ©2017 plymouth yarn company 102117jbt abbreviations k = knit k2tog= knit two sts together p = purl p2tog = purl 2 sts together rs= right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side yo= yarn over chain = chain skip = skip double_crochet= double_crochet st s = stitch es space = space m1 = make 1 st = lift bar onto needle knit into the back of it to increase 1 st kf&b = knit into the front and the back of the stitch
